high.comment: Often used in hover states.

mid.comment: Often used in the standard state.

high.comment: Neutral action high is used for hover states on a secondary and tertiary interactions.

low.comment: Neutral Low is most commonly used for press states on secondary and tertiary interactions.

mid.comment: Neutral Mid is often used as the standard fill for secondary and tertiary interactions actions. It may also be used as a hover state on secondary and tertiary actions.

selected.comment: For use as the selected state on secondary and tertiary interactions.

high.comment: Neutral action text should always be paired with the neutral action fills. High is often used as a hover or standard state.

mid.comment: Neutral action text should always be paired with the neutral action fills. Mid is often used as a standard state.

high.comment: Primary high is used for hover states on a primary or secondary action.

low.comment: Primary Low is most commonly used for press states.

mid.comment: Primary Mid is often used as the standard fill for primary actions. It may also be used as a hover state on secondary and tertiary actions.

text.comment: Primary action text should always be paired with the primary action fills.

high.comment: Secondary action high is used for hover states on a secondary and tertiary action.

low.comment: Secondary Low is most commonly used for press states on secondary and tertiary actions.

mid.comment: Secondary Mid is often used as the standard fill for secondary actions. It may also be used as a hover state on secondary and tertiary actions.

selected.comment: For use as the selected state on secondary actions.

text.comment: Secondary action text should always be paired with secondary action fills.

low.comment: Surfaces are solid colors. When picking your surface, think of it similar to a tiered cake, would be to top bottom.
